title: Outbreak Among Farm Workers Would Be Catastrophic...
description: Outbreak Among Farm Workers Would Be Catastrophic... (Top headline, 12th story, link ) Related stories: Chris Cuomo's 'haunted' night: Shivering, hallucinating, beaten 'like piñata'... NYC BRACES FOR PEAK DEATH... Paramedics told NOT to bring cardiac arrest p…
content:
(Bloomberg Opinion) -- There is no evidence that Covid-19 has been transmitted by food or food packaging, according to U.S. federal health agencies.  How the virus fares among food workers may be a different story.
